amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to require the Federal Election Commission to include in its report to Congress an analysis of disinformation campaigns focused on influencing military servicemembers and veterans along with recommendations to address these efforts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
